001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.CaseChanging;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.DefaultPatternRegistry.CustomConverterKey;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternFormatterFactory.KeywordFactory;
016
017/**
018 * Pattern registry to register custom keywords.
019 */
020public sealed interface PatternRegistry {
021
022        /*
023         * TODO this is a mutable component!
024         */
025
026        /**
027         * Gets the formatter factory for the pattern key.
028         * @param key keyword.
029         * @return factory or null.
030         */
031        public @Nullable PatternFormatterFactory getOrNull(String key);
032
033        /**
034         * Registers a pattern key with a formatter factory. You may replace the built-in
035         * pattern formatters with {@link KeywordKey} or {@link ColorKey}s or create a new key
036         * with {@link PatternKey#of(String)}.
037         * @param key pattern keys.
038         * @param factory factory to create formatters from pattern keywords.
039         */
040        public void register(PatternKey key, PatternFormatterFactory factory);
041
042        /**
043         * Convenience to register factories that have keys associated with them by
044         * implementing {@link PatternKeyProvider}.
045         * @param <P> pattern formatter that has keys associated with it.
046         * @param factory factory that also has a key.
047         * @see #register(PatternKey, PatternFormatterFactory)
048         */
049        default <P extends PatternKeyProvider & PatternFormatterFactory> void register(P factory) {
050                register(factory.key(), factory);
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Convenience function for {@link #register(PatternKey, PatternFormatterFactory)} as
055         * keyword factory is a lambda.
056         * @param key pattern keys.
057         * @param factory factory create formatter from a simple keyword.
058         */
059        default void keyword(PatternKey key, KeywordFactory factory) {
060                register(key, factory);
061        }
062
063        /**
064         * Creates a pattern registry with the defaults.
065         * @return default registry.
066         */
067        public static PatternRegistry of() {
068                return DefaultPatternRegistry.registerDefaults(new DefaultPatternRegistry());
069        }
070
071        /**
072         * Pattern keywords.
073         *
074         * @see KeywordKey
075         * @see ColorKey
076         */
077        public sealed interface PatternKey {
078
079                /**
080                 * Keyword names.
081                 * @return keywords should not be empty.
082                 */
083                List<String> aliases();
084
085                /**
086                 * Creates a pattern key of one key name.
087                 * @param key key name.
088                 * @return pattern key.
089                 */
090                public static PatternKey of(String key) {
091                        return new CustomConverterKey(List.of(key));
092                }
093
094                /**
095                 * Creates a pattern key of one key and aliases.
096                 * @param key key name.
097                 * @param aliases other names.
098                 * @return pattern key.
099                 */
100                public static PatternKey of(String key, String... aliases) {
101                        List<String> keys = new ArrayList<>();
102                        keys.add(Objects.requireNonNull(key));
103                        for (var a : aliases) {
104                                keys.add(Objects.requireNonNull(a));
105                        }
106                        return new CustomConverterKey(List.copyOf(keys));
107                }
108
109        }
110
111        /**
112         * Implement this interface along with the formatter for easier registration.
113         *
114         * @see PatternRegistry#register(PatternKeyProvider)
115         */
116        public interface PatternKeyProvider {
117
118                /**
119                 * Key
120                 * @return key.
121                 */
122                PatternKey key();
123
124        }
125
126        /**
127         * Built-in supported pattern keys.
128         */
129        @CaseChanging
130        enum KeywordKey implements PatternKey {
131
132                /**
133                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#date">Date keywords</a>
134                 */
135                DATE("d", "date"), //
136                /**
137                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#micros">Micros keywords</a>
138                 */
139                MICROS("ms", "micros"), //
140                /**
141                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#file">File</a>
142                 */
143                FILE("f", "file"),
144                /**
145                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#line">Line no</a>
146                 */
147                LINE("L", "line"),
148                /**
149                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#class">Calling class</a>
150                 */
151                CLASS("C", "class"),
152                /**
153                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#line">Line no</a>
154                 */
155                METHOD("M", "method"),
156                /**
157                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#relative">Thread
158                 * keywords</a>
159                 */
160                THREAD("t", "thread"), //
161                /**
162                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#level">Level keywords</a>
163                 */
164                LEVEL("level", "le", "p"), //
165                /**
166                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#logger">Logger keywords</a>
167                 */
168                LOGGER("lo", "logger", "c"), //
169                /**
170                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#message">Message
171                 * keywords</a>
172                 */
173                MESSAGE("m", "msg", "message"), //
174                /**
175                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#mdc">MDC keywords</a>
176                 */
177                MDC("X", "mdc"), //
178                /**
179                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#mdc">Property keywords</a>
180                 * @see PatternConfig#propertyFunction()
181                 */
182                PROPERTY("property"), //
183                /**
184                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#ex">Throwable keywords</a>
185                 */
186                THROWABLE("ex", "exception", "throwable"), //
187                /**
188                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#newline">Newline
189                 * keywords</a>
190                 */
191                LINESEP("n");
192
193                private final List<String> aliases;
194
195                private KeywordKey(List<String> aliases) {
196                        this.aliases = aliases;
197                }
198
199                private KeywordKey(String... others) {
200                        this(List.of(others));
201                }
202
203                public List<String> aliases() {
204                        return this.aliases;
205                }
206
207        }
208
209        /**
210         * Built-in supported color pattern keys.
211         */
212        @CaseChanging
213        enum ColorKey implements PatternKey {
214
215                /**
216                 * ANSI black color
217                 */
218                BLACK("black"), //
219                /**
220                 * ANSI red color
221                 */
222                RED("red"), //
223                /**
224                 * ANSI green color
225                 */
226                GREEN("green"), //
227                /**
228                 * ANSI yellow color
229                 */
230                YELLOW("yellow"), //
231                /**
232                 * ANSI blue color
233                 */
234                BLUE("blue"), //
235                /**
236                 * ANSI magenta color
237                 */
238                MAGENTA("magenta"), //
239                /**
240                 * ANSI cyan color
241                 */
242                CYAN("cyan"), //
243                /**
244                 * ANSI white color
245                 */
246                WHITE("white"), //
247                /**
248                 * ANSI gray color
249                 */
250                GRAY("gray"), //
251                /**
252                 * ANSI boldRed color
253                 */
254                BOLD_RED("boldRed"), //
255                /**
256                 * ANSI boldGreen color
257                 */
258                BOLD_GREEN("boldGreen"), //
259                /**
260                 * ANSI boldYellow color
261                 */
262                BOLD_YELLOW("boldYellow"), //
263                /**
264                 * ANSI boldBlue color
265                 */
266                BOLD_BLUE("boldBlue"), //
267                /**
268                 * ANSI boldMagenta color
269                 */
270                BOLD_MAGENTA("boldMagenta"), //
271                /**
272                 * ANSI boldCyan color
273                 */
274                BOLD_CYAN("boldCyan"), //
275                /**
276                 * ANSI boldWhite color
277                 */
278                BOLD_WHITE("boldWhite"), //
279                /**
280                 * A special color composite key that will highlight based on logger level.
281                 */
282                HIGHLIGHT("highlight"), //
283                ;
284
285                private final List<String> aliases;
286
287                private ColorKey(List<String> aliases) {
288                        this.aliases = aliases;
289                }
290
291                private ColorKey(String... others) {
292                        this(List.of(others));
293                }
294
295                public List<String> aliases() {
296                        return this.aliases;
297                }
298
299        }
300
301        // config.conversionRule("clr", ColorConverter.class);
302        // config.conversionRule("correlationId", CorrelationIdConverter.class);
303        // config.conversionRule("esb", EnclosedInSquareBracketsConverter.class);
304        // config.conversionRule("wex", WhitespaceThrowableProxyConverter.class);
305        // config.conversionRule("wEx", ExtendedWhitespaceThrowableProxyConverter.class)
306
307        /**
308         * Spring Boot patterns.
309         */
310        @CaseChanging
311        enum SpringBootKey implements PatternKey {
312
313                /*
314                 * TODO maybe this should be in the spring boot module only?
315                 */
316
317                /**
318                 * <a href=
319                 * "https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/reference/features/logging.html#features.logging.console-output.color-coded">
320                 * Spring Boot color pattern key</a>
321                 *
322                 */
323                CLR("clr"),
324                /**
325                 * Spring Boot converter that surrounds property in square brackets.
326                 */
327                ESB("esb");
328
329                private final List<String> aliases;
330
331                private SpringBootKey(List<String> aliases) {
332                        this.aliases = aliases;
333                }
334
335                private SpringBootKey(String... others) {
336                        this(List.of(others));
337                }
338
339                @Override
340                public List<String> aliases() {
341                        return this.aliases;
342                }
343
344        }
345
346}
347
348final class DefaultPatternRegistry implements PatternRegistry {
349
350        private final Map<String, PatternKey> keys = new HashMap<>();
351
352        private final Map<PatternKey, PatternFormatterFactory> converters = new HashMap<>();
353
354        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
355
356        public DefaultPatternRegistry() {
357                super();
358        }
359
360        public void register(PatternKey key, PatternFormatterFactory factory) {
361                lock.writeLock().lock();
362                try {
363                        var f = converters.get(key);
364                        if (f == null) {
365                                for (var a : key.aliases()) {
366                                        if (keys.containsKey(a)) {
367                                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Key already registered: " + a);
368                                        }
369                                        keys.put(a, key);
370                                }
371                        }
372                        converters.put(key, factory);
373                }
374                finally {
375                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
376                }
377        }
378
379        public @Nullable PatternFormatterFactory getOrNull(String key) {
380                lock.readLock().lock();
381                try {
382                        var ck = keys.get(key);
383                        if (ck == null)
384                                return null;
385                        return converters.get(ck);
386                }
387                finally {
388                        lock.readLock().unlock();
389                }
390        }
391
392        static PatternRegistry registerDefaults(PatternRegistry registry) {
393                for (KeywordKey c : KeywordKey.values()) {
394                        KeywordFactory keyword = switch (c) {
395                                case MESSAGE -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.builder().message().build());
396                                case DATE -> StandardKeywordFactory.DATE;
397                                case LEVEL -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.LevelFormatter.of());
398                                case LINESEP -> (fc, n) -> new LogFormatter.StaticFormatter(fc.lineSeparator());
399                                case LOGGER -> StandardKeywordFactory.LOGGER;
400                                case MDC -> StandardKeywordFactory.MDC;
401                                case MICROS -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter.ofMicros());
402                                case THREAD -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.builder().threadName().build());
403                                case THROWABLE -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.ThrowableFormatter.of());
404                                case CLASS -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.CLASS);
405                                case FILE -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.FILE);
406                                case LINE -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.LINE);
407                                case METHOD -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.METHOD);
408                                case PROPERTY -> StandardKeywordFactory.PROPERTY;
409                        };
410
411                        registry.register(c, keyword);
412                }
413
414                for (ColorKey c : ColorKey.values()) {
415                        var factory = switch (c) {
416                                case RED -> ColorCompositeFactory.RED;
417                                case BLACK -> ColorCompositeFactory.BLACK;
418                                case BLUE -> ColorCompositeFactory.BLUE;
419                                case CYAN -> ColorCompositeFactory.CYAN;
420                                case GRAY -> ColorCompositeFactory.GRAY;
421                                case GREEN -> ColorCompositeFactory.GREEN;
422                                case MAGENTA -> ColorCompositeFactory.MAGENTA;
423                                case WHITE -> ColorCompositeFactory.WHITE;
424                                case YELLOW -> ColorCompositeFactory.YELLOW;
425                                case BOLD_BLUE -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_BLUE;
426                                case BOLD_CYAN -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_CYAN;
427                                case BOLD_GREEN -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_GREEN;
428                                case BOLD_MAGENTA -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_MAGENTA;
429                                case BOLD_RED -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_RED;
430                                case BOLD_WHITE -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_WHITE;
431                                case BOLD_YELLOW -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_YELLOW;
432                                case HIGHLIGHT -> HighlightCompositeFactory.HIGHTLIGHT;
433                        };
434                        registry.register(c, factory);
435                }
436
437                for (SpringBootKey sk : SpringBootKey.values()) {
438                        var factory = switch (sk) {
439                                case CLR -> HighlightCompositeFactory.CLR;
440                                case ESB -> StandardKeywordFactory.ENCLOSED_SQUARE_BRACKET;
441                        };
442                        registry.register(sk, factory);
443                }
444
445                registry.register(BareKey.BARE, BareCompositeFactory.BARE);
446                return registry;
447        }
448
449        record CustomConverterKey(List<String> aliases) implements PatternKey {
450
451        }
452
453        enum BareKey implements PatternKey {
454
455                BARE() {
456                        @Override
457                        public List<String> aliases() {
458                                return List.of("BARE");
459                        }
460
461                }
462
463        }
